user.title: Tado CE Setup
user.description: Click Submit to start the authorization process.

authorize.title: Authorize Tado
authorize.description:
**Step 1:** Click the link below to open Tado login:

**[Click here to authorize]({url})**

Or go to `https://login.tado.com/device` and enter code: **{code}**

**Step 2:** Log in to your Tado account and authorize the connection.

**Step 3:** After you see "Successfully connected" on Tado's website, click Submit below.

data_description.weather_enabled: Get outside temperature and solar intensity (+1 API call per quick sync)
data_description.mobile_devices_enabled: Track mobile devices for geofencing (+1 API call per full sync)
data_description.home_state_sync_enabled: Sync Tado home/away state for Away Mode switch and climate presets (+1 API call per quick sync)
data_description.offset_enabled: Add offset_celsius attribute to climate entities (+1 API call per device per full sync)
data_description.schedule_calendar_enabled: Display heating schedules as calendar entities (read-only, uses cached schedule data)

data_description.day_start_hour: Hour when day period starts (0-23, default: 7)
data_description.night_start_hour: Hour when night period starts (0-23, default: 23)
data_description.custom_day_interval: Override smart polling for daytime (1-1440 minutes, leave empty for auto)
data_description.custom_night_interval: Override smart polling for nighttime (1-1440 minutes, leave empty for auto)

data.test_mode_enabled: Enable Test Mode (100 API call limit)

data_description.hot_water_timer_duration: Default duration when turning on hot water (5-1440 minutes, default: 60)
data_description.refresh_debounce_seconds: Wait time before refreshing after changes (1-60 seconds, default: 15). Higher = fewer API calls
data_description.mobile_devices_frequent_sync: Sync mobile devices on every quick sync instead of only during full sync (every 6 hours)
data_description.api_history_retention_days: Days to keep API call history (0 = forever, default: 14)
data_description.test_mode_enabled: Simulate post-grace period with 100 API call limit for testing

error.interval_out_of_range: Polling interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes
